channel.title: CCPA on PLAIT
channel.description: Recent content in CCPA on PLAIT

item.title: Mission Statement: Patients' Data Privacy
item.description: Patient's data safety and security rights are the highest priority for us. We have built an extensive pre-processing procedure, by which we try to automatically (pseudo)anonymize the data you as the patient's MD are handing over to us. Note, that we do NOT want to own private data! We encourage you to de-individualize, thus anonymize, your patient's data yourself before transmitting them to us. Lorem ipsum comes and goes.
